nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify EOS tab visibility state changes based on employee offboarding status
checks.selector_hint: End of Service tab or section in employee profile
checks.assertion: EOS tab should be visible for active employees and hidden/unavailable for offboarded employees

checks.description: Verify EOS tab displays disabled or greyed-out state for offboarded employees
checks.selector_hint: End of Service tab element with disabled styling
checks.assertion: Tab should display visual indicator (greyed, disabled class, or opacity change) when employee is offboarded

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity file displays clear month identification and labeling
checks.selector_hint: Month label or date header in gratuity file download interface
checks.assertion: Month should be clearly labeled with full month name and year (e.g., 'March 2024')

checks.description: Verify gratuity data labels are consistent between employee profile and downloaded file
checks.selector_hint: Data field labels in gratuity report or download preview
checks.assertion: Month identifiers should match between profile view and exported file

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify hiring date field displays disabled or locked state when employee has payroll history
checks.selector_hint: Hiring date input field in employee profile or EOS section
checks.assertion: Field should be disabled or show lock indicator when payroll transactions exist

checks.description: Verify error message displays when attempting to modify hiring date with payroll history
checks.selector_hint: Error message or validation feedback near hiring date field
checks.assertion: Error message should explain that hiring date cannot be changed due to existing payroll transactions

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify date range selection options exist for gratuity report generation
checks.selector_hint: Date range picker, dropdown, or filter controls in gratuity download interface
checks.assertion: Date range selector should allow selection of custom start and end dates for historical reporting

checks.description: Verify monthly granularity option exists for gratuity report generation
checks.selector_hint: Report frequency or granularity dropdown in gratuity report settings
checks.assertion: Should provide option to generate monthly (vs. annual or other) gratuity reports

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify Gratuity field is available in custom payroll report template dropdown
checks.selector_hint: Field selection dropdown or field picker in custom report builder
checks.assertion: Gratuity field should be selectable from available fields list

checks.description: Verify documentation or tooltip explains when gratuity values populate in custom reports
checks.selector_hint: Help text, tooltip, or note near Gratuity field in report builder
checks.assertion: Should indicate that gratuity values only appear for employees with completed EOS

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify accrual report interface shows available payroll cycles for selection
checks.selector_hint: Payroll cycle dropdown or month/period selector in accrual report interface
checks.assertion: Should display list of closed payroll cycles, not just the most recent one

checks.description: Verify historical accrual reports are accessible for previous closed months
checks.selector_hint: Report data or results section showing accrual information
checks.assertion: Reports should be retrievable for all closed payroll cycles, not limited to latest

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify leave encashment daily wage calculation setting is accessible and configurable
checks.selector_hint: Leave encashment calculation dropdown or radio buttons in EOS configuration
checks.assertion: Should provide option to select 'Basic / Working days' or similar calculation basis

checks.description: Verify End of Service Eligibility section reflects the selected leave encashment calculation setting
checks.selector_hint: Eligibility section text or calculation basis display in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Eligibility display should update to show selected calculation method (e.g., 'Basic / working days' when selected)

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify pro-rated EOS amounts display with correct decimal precision
checks.selector_hint: Pro-rated amount field or calculation result in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Pro-rated amounts should display with consistent decimal precision (no rounding errors)

checks.description: Verify daily wage calculation formula is displayed or accessible in EOS breakdown
checks.selector_hint: Calculation breakdown or formula display in EOS details
checks.assertion: Should show daily wage calculation (basic + allowances / 30) in calculation breakdown

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity accrual report column headers are clear and descriptive
checks.selector_hint: Column header text in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: Headers should clearly distinguish between 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount at end of payroll cycle'

checks.description: Verify tooltips or help text explain accrual column definitions
checks.selector_hint: Tooltip or help icon near column headers in accrual report
checks.assertion: Hovering over column headers should display explanatory text about accrual timing

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify EOS tenure calculation displays gross service duration before deductions
checks.selector_hint: Tenure or service duration field in EOS calculation interface
checks.assertion: Should display total service duration (e.g., '1 year, 6 months') before unpaid leave deductions

checks.description: Verify unpaid leave deductions are shown separately in tenure calculation breakdown
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid leave deduction line item in EOS calculation details
checks.assertion: Should show unpaid leave days (e.g., '78 days') as separate line item in calculation

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify final settlement amount breakdown shows all component calculations
checks.selector_hint: Settlement amount breakdown or calculation details in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Should display line items for gratuity, pro-rated salary, leave encashment, and expenses

checks.description: Verify previously processed payments are shown as deductions in settlement calculation
checks.selector_hint: Previous payment or adjustment line item in settlement breakdown
checks.assertion: Should show previously processed payment amounts as separate deduction line

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify closing balance from one month matches opening balance of next month in accrual report
checks.selector_hint: Opening and closing balance fields in consecutive months of accrual report
checks.assertion: Closing balance of month N should equal opening balance of month N+1

checks.description: Verify new hire employees do not appear in accrual reports before their hire date
checks.selector_hint: Employee list or data rows in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: Employees hired after report period should not appear with negative or incorrect accrual amounts

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity calculation methodology is documented or explained in UI
checks.selector_hint: Help text, tooltip, or calculation details section in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Should provide explanation of gratuity calculation formula or methodology used

checks.description: Verify gratuity amount is clearly displayed in EOS calculation
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity amount field in EOS calculation interface
checks.assertion: Gratuity amount should be visible and editable in EOS interface

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity report allows selection of additional information fields
checks.selector_hint: Field selection or customization options in gratuity report interface
checks.assertion: Should provide checkboxes or toggles to include/exclude additional report fields

checks.description: Verify days of service field is available in gratuity report
checks.selector_hint: Days of service column or field in gratuity report
checks.assertion: Report should include or allow inclusion of days of service calculation

checks.description: Verify gratuity report provides filtering or exclusion option for GCC nationals
checks.selector_hint: Filter dropdown or checkbox for nationality-based exclusion in report settings
checks.assertion: Should provide option to exclude GCC nationals or show zero accrual for pension program participants

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify leave calculation method option exists in EOS configuration
checks.selector_hint: Leave calculation method dropdown or radio buttons in EOS settings
checks.assertion: Should provide option to select between different leave proration methods

checks.description: Verify leave days calculation is displayed with clear methodology
checks.selector_hint: Leave days field or calculation breakdown in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Should show how leave days are calculated and allow verification of methodology

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify EOS processed amount displays consistently across different views
checks.selector_hint: Processed amount field in EOS tab, transaction page, and payroll table
checks.assertion: Processed amount should be identical when viewed from EOS tab, transaction page, and payroll table

checks.description: Verify transaction amounts are consistent across all payroll system views
checks.selector_hint: Amount fields in different payroll modules and views
checks.assertion: Same transaction should display same amount in all system locations

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity description reflects correct country regulations
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity description or label text in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Description should reference appropriate country labor law (not hardcoded to KSA for non-KSA employees)

checks.description: Verify employee currency is maintained during EOS offboarding and adjustments
checks.selector_hint: Currency field or indicator in EOS interface and adjustment screens
checks.assertion: Currency should remain consistent with employee's configured currency throughout EOS process

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify leave policy provides option to include/exclude unpaid leave in EOS calculations
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid leave handling dropdown or checkbox in leave policy configuration
checks.assertion: Should provide configurable option to exclude unpaid leave days from service duration calculation

checks.description: Verify service duration calculation is displayed with clear breakdown
checks.selector_hint: Service duration field in EOS interface showing years, months, and days
checks.assertion: Should display service duration calculation with transparent handling of unpaid leave

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify navigation to Finance > Payroll table is accessible
checks.selector_hint: Finance menu item and Payroll table link
checks.assertion: Should navigate to Payroll table view from Finance menu

checks.description: Verify all EOS workflow steps are accessible (departure date, reason, contract type, additions, deductions)
checks.selector_hint: EOS form fields and sections in employee profile
checks.assertion: Should display all required fields: departure date, reason, contract type, additions, deductions

checks.description: Verify gratuity calculation rules are applied (UAE law, non-AED handling, contract type handling)
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity amount display and calculation details in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Gratuity should be calculated per UAE labor law; non-AED employees should show 0 gratuity

checks.description: Verify variable pay and work expenses are not shown for future departure dates
checks.selector_hint: Variable pay and work expenses fields in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Fields should be hidden or disabled when departure date is in the future

nav.canonical: Employee Profile > End of Service > Contract Type > Reason for Departure

checks.description: Verify End of Service section is accessible from employee profile
checks.selector_hint: End of Service tab or link in employee profile
checks.assertion: Should navigate to EOS section when clicked from employee profile

checks.description: Verify contract type selection options are available in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Contract type dropdown in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Should provide dropdown with contract type options (limited, unlimited, etc.)

checks.description: Verify departure reason selection options are available in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Reason for departure dropdown in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Should provide dropdown with departure reason options

checks.description: Verify gratuity amount updates based on contract type and departure reason selection
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity amount field in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Gratuity should recalculate when contract type or departure reason changes
